metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14335 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in H2 1.4.197. Insecure handling of permissions in the backup function allows attackers to read sensitive files (outside of their permissions) via a symlink to a fake database file.

criterions.comment: h2database: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
